headline: Clearway Energy: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Princeton, New Jersey-based company said it had profit of 28 cents per share. The results fell short of Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 67 cents per share.

headline: NRG closes on Texas Energy Fund loan for 456 MW natural gas generation project
summary: NRG Energy (NRG) executed a loan agreement with the Public Utility Commission of Texas and received initial funding for two new natural gas units at the company’s existing TH Wharton power plant as a part of the Texas Energy Fund Loan Program. The combined 456 MW nameplate capacity units are expected to start bringing power to the Houston load zone in Summer 2026. “NRG is committed to serving the needs of Texans today and in the future. headline: If You Invested $1000 in NRG Energy 10 Years Ago, This Is How Much You'd Have Now
summary: Investing in certain stocks can pay off in the long run, especially if you hold on for a decade or more.
